code: import{connect}from'react-redux';import{setValue as _setValue,selectCell as _selectCell}from'../actions/sudokuActions.js';import Cell from'../components/Cell';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state,ownProps){var highlighted=false;if(ownProps.type==='input'&&state['highlight'][ownProps.x][ownProps.y]){highlighted=true;}return{value:state[ownProps.type][ownProps.x][ownProps.y],highlighted:highlighted,disabled:ownProps.type!=='input'};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch,ownProps){return{setValue:function setValue(value){return dispatch(_setValue(ownProps.x,ownProps.y,value));},selectCell:function selectCell(){return dispatch(_selectCell(ownProps.x,ownProps.y));}};};var CellContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Cell);export default CellContainer;
